alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 9:12PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 912 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gold Canyon, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Apache Junction, Gold Canyon, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Superstition Mountains, Gold Camp, Kings Ranch, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, and Tortilla Flat. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 193 and 218. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 147 and 150. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
